channel.title: Guardian PK [BETA]
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=6]Guardian PK [BETA][/SIZE][/CENTER] [CENTER] Welcome to the beta of my new server. This is as I said just now a BETA. There will be bugs. There will be changes. There will be more content.
For now i'm just in need of a small player base which is why i'm posting some advertisements. Server will still be 24/7.
For some basic content this is a [SIZE=5] SPAWN PK/ ECO [/SIZE]
PK Points Shop [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3925069/pkp_shop.png[/img]
Barrows Shop (costs PK Points) [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3925064/barrows.png[/img]
Guardian Blade (slightly better than ags, hard to get) [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3925066/guardian_blade.png[/img]
Quest tab for quick spawns/spec restore [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3925072/quest.png[/img]
So in the mean time while we work through the BETA we will be using some cheepo forums and dropbox for the client here are the links:
Forums: [url=http://www.guardianpk.createaforum.com]Guardian PK - Index[/url]
Client: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93536668/Guardian%20PK%20Beta.jar]Guardian PK Beta.jar[/url]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Guardian PK [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=6]Guardian PK [BETA][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER]
Welcome to the beta of my new server. This is as I said just now a BETA. There will be bugs. There will be changes. There will be more content.

For now i’m just in need of a small player base which is why i’m posting some advertisements. Server will still be 24/7.

For some basic content this is a [SIZE=5] SPAWN PK/ ECO [/SIZE]

PK Points Shop

Barrows Shop (costs PK Points)

Guardian Blade (slightly better than ags, hard to get)

Quest tab for quick spawns/spec restore

So in the mean time while we work through the BETA we will be using some cheepo forums and dropbox for the client here are the links:

Forums:
Guardian PK - Index

Client:
Guardian PK Beta.jar

[/CENTER]
